channel.title: In Progress on Zack's Notablog
channel.description: Recent content in In Progress on Zack's Notablog

item.title: Send a File
item.description: Is it secure? This question really is a bunch of questions together. Security that is important is end-to-end encryption and guaranteed that the right recipient(s) receives the file. Is it fast? This is probably the most important question. Basically the speed will be rate-limited by the network, but a fast file transfer should utilize the network as much as possible. Is it easy to use (e.g. for an average person and not a CS major)?
